ygData.subject: Some Questions on a Magic Item gotten by me
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey guys, Ive gotten a studded leather Collar for 1pp of one of the players.At first I wanted to refuse immediately until he told me the stats.I never knew
ygData.messageBody:
Hey guys,
Ive gotten a studded leather Collar for 1pp of one of the players.At first I wanted to refuse immediately until he told me the stats.I never knew studded leather armour was considered magical but heres wat it is:

Studded Leather Collar
MAGIC ITEM
AC:3
STR+1 STA+1

Thus I bought it and replaced my banded gorget,anyone know if this item is better than banded gorget?Coz its AC is only 3 compared to Banded.PS:Anywya its only 1pp..heh

Entreri
